Load packages

```{r}
#load packages
library(here)
library(tidyverse) 
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(viridis)
library(patchwork)
library(ggimage)
```


Read in data

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2020-08-04')

energy_types <- tuesdata$energy_types

unique(energy_types$country_name)
```



Data check

```{r}
summary(energy_types)

head(energy_types)
```


NA check

```{r}
sum(is.na(energy_types))
```
